alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 2:57PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Nassau and northeastern Duval Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 257 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Talbot Island, or 11 miles south of Fernandina Beach, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Amelia City, Little Talbot Island, Mayport and Talbot Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
